dcatapit:Catalog.dct:title: EmpowerItaly Project Catalog
dcatapit:Catalog.dct:description: Catalogue containing datasets for the project EmpowerItaly

dcatapit:Dataset.dct:title: D1(a) - Resident foreign population by region 2019-2023
dcatapit:Dataset.dct:description: This dataset was used to see the total number of resident immigrants, the average age and the distribution over the Italian territory. The first two data are related to year 2022, while the last, in conjunction with D1(b), respresent the distrubition on the italian territory from between 2018 and 2022.

dcatapit:Dataset.dct:title: D1(b) - Resident foreign population by region 2001-2019
dcatapit:Dataset.dct:description: This dataset was needed to implement D1(a) results with data relative to year 2018.

dcatapit:Dataset.dct:title: D2 - Total immigrants to Italy by continent and region
dcatapit:Dataset.dct:description: This dataset was used to see the original provenance of foreigners in Italy.

dcatapit:Dataset.dct:title: D4 - Level of education of foreign citizens
dcatapit:Dataset.dct:description: This dataset was used in order to understand the educational level attained by foreigners in Italy. The levels considered in this dataset are: Primary (ED0-2), inglobing less than primary, primary and lower secondary education. Secondary (ED3:4), inglobing upper secondary and post-secondary non-tertiary education. Tertiary (ED5-8), inglobing tertiary education.

dcatapit:Dataset.dct:title: D5 - Activity rate between foreigners and italians
dcatapit:Dataset.dct:description: This dataset was used in order to understand the activity rates betweens italians and foreigners. As active citizens is understood to be the ones either looking for a occupation or already inserted in the labour market.

dcatapit:Dataset.dct:title: D6 - Presence of foreigners divided by industry sector
dcatapit:Dataset.dct:description: This dataset was retrieved in order to understand what are the sector in which foreigners work the most in Italy.

dcatapit:Dataset.dct:title: D7 - Unemployment rate between foreigners and italians
dcatapit:Dataset.dct:description: This dataset was retrieved in order to understand the unemployment rates between foreigners and italians.

dcatapit:Dataset.dct:title: D8 - Annual average households income
dcatapit:Dataset.dct:description: This dataset was retrieved in order to...

dcatapit:Dataset.dct:title: D9 - GDP (Growth rate)
dcatapit:Dataset.dct:description: This dataset was retrieved to put into comparison the GDP Growth Rate with other rates.

dcatapit:Dataset.dct:title: MD1 - Activity & Unemployment rate between foreigners and italians
dcatapit:Dataset.dct:description: This dataset is the result of the mashup for the project
